name: Megania Online - 2d MMORPG
description:
The game will open soon on a weekend to record its trailer with some battles and player events. Join us to participate!

https://MeganiaOnline.com

What is Megania Online?

A 2d mmorpg that features classic rogue-like elements and top down rpgs. 

  • Well-defined, old-school classes (Warrior, Archer, Druid, and Wizard)
  • Cartoon-type combat animations (Boom! Zas! WoW! ...)
  • PvP in open world
  • Guild system
  • Bank and exchange of objects between players
  • Skills by class, potions and runes to get you into adventure
  • Very dark caves and importance of torch and spells
  • Crafting equipment and consumables
